attributes.action: Intervene in helping us, the community of Haselbury in Edmonton, to stop the closure of our library.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned are appalled by the re-location of a well used and much loved community library in Weir Hall Edmonton. This library serves a diverse community and is near six schools and is well used by students studying outside school hours. The figures of users compares favourably with other libraries in the more affluent areas of the Borough.
